verses.name: Ezekiel 44:19
verses.text: And when they go forth into the utter court, even into the utter court to the people, they shall put off their garments wherein they ministered, and lay them in the holy chambers, and they shall put on other garments; and they shall not sanctify the people with their garments.

verses.name: Ezekiel 44:20
verses.text: Neither shall they shave their heads, nor suffer their locks to grow long; they shall only poll their heads.

verses.name: Ezekiel 44:21
verses.text: Neither shall any priest drink wine, when they enter into the inner court.
